summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1421, for the improvement of Pike Street, from a point 30 feet west of the west line of 3rd Avenue, to the alley between 1st Avenue and Western Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 15498 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
